product.name: Candy
product.brief_description: Candy Kittens Sour Watermelon Vegan Sweets - Palm Oil Free, Natural Fruit Flavour Candy - Gummy Chewy Gourmet Sweets, 145g (Resealable Share Bag)
product.p1: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime delivery.
product.p2: Note: This item is eligible for FREE Click and Collect without a minimum order subject to availability.
product.p3: SOUR WATERMELON SWEETS: Leave those taste buds tingling with the one-in-a-melon flavour of our Sour Watermelon Vegan Sweets, a delectable gourmet candy made with the finest natural ingredients
product.p4: FRUIT JUICE & 100% NATURAL FLAVOURS: We use no artificial colours or flavours in our chewy gummy candies; These delicious confections are made with fruit juice and plant-based ingredients; Yes, they’re 100% natural
product.p5: VEGAN & VEGETARIAN FRIENDLY: Candy Kittens Sour Watermelon Sweets contain absolutely no gelatine; We’ve carefully crafted our new recipes to make our candy taste better than ever; Now everyone can enjoy Candy Kittens gourmet vegan gummy sweets
product.p6: PALM OIL & DAIRY FREE: We think it's just plain unfair that people with diets free of dairy and palm oil sometimes miss out on yummy treats; We've created candies that you, your family, and your friends can all enjoy
product.p7: GREAT TASTE: The tastiest plant-based sweets you will ever try, packed in a handy bag to take with you anywhere you go; Sweeten up your day; Keep them in your backpack or purse and to treat yourself to Candy Kittens on the go
